results.name: Baldi's Basics Classic with Classic Remasterd or Plus Textures!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
